name: Project Pluto!
description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pluto and his owner were inseparable and loved doing things together. Their happiness was put to a halt when Pluto was kidnapped -- by the evil corporation, Malitech. Journey alongside the protagonist through futuristic levels and defeat waves of bosses to reach Malitech's CEO and rescue Pluto!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: This game was created in the elements of game development course as part of the elements of computing certificate coursework. My team and I completed this project over one semester.

Team Members: Jordan Toler, Ryan Truong, Kireeti Singam Setty

Artwork/Visuals: Jordan Toler/Kireeti Singam Setty

Audio/Effects: Jordan Toler/Kireeti Singam Setty

Coding: Ryan Truong/Kireeti Singam Setty/Jordan Toler
